00015 #include "util.h"
00016 
00017 #include "test.h"
00018 
00019 TEST(CanonicalizePath, PathSamples) {
00020   std::string path = "foo.h";
00021   std::string err;
00022   EXPECT_TRUE(CanonicalizePath(&path, &err));
00023   EXPECT_EQ("", err);
00024   EXPECT_EQ("foo.h", path);
00025 
00026   path = "./foo.h"; err = "";
00027   EXPECT_TRUE(CanonicalizePath(&path, &err));
00028   EXPECT_EQ("", err);
00029   EXPECT_EQ("foo.h", path);
00030 
00031   path = "./foo/./bar.h"; err = "";
00032   EXPECT_TRUE(CanonicalizePath(&path, &err));
00033   EXPECT_EQ("", err);
00034   EXPECT_EQ("foo/bar.h", path);
00035 
00036   path = "./x/foo/../bar.h"; err = "";
00037   EXPECT_TRUE(CanonicalizePath(&path, &err));
00038   EXPECT_EQ("", err);
00039   EXPECT_EQ("x/bar.h", path);
00040 
00041   path = "./x/foo/../../bar.h"; err = "";
00042   EXPECT_TRUE(CanonicalizePath(&path, &err));
00043   EXPECT_EQ("", err);
00044   EXPECT_EQ("bar.h", path);
00045 
00046   path = "foo//bar"; err = "";
00047   EXPECT_TRUE(CanonicalizePath(&path, &err));
00048   EXPECT_EQ("", err);
00049   EXPECT_EQ("foo/bar", path);
00050 
00051   path = "./x/../foo/../../bar.h"; err = "";
00052   EXPECT_FALSE(CanonicalizePath(&path, &err));
00053   EXPECT_EQ("can't canonicalize path './x/../foo/../../bar.h' that reaches "
00054             "above its directory", err);
00055 }
00056 
00057 TEST(CanonicalizePath, AbsolutePath) {
00058   string path = "/usr/include/stdio.h";
00059   string err = "";
00060   EXPECT_TRUE(CanonicalizePath(&path, &err));
00061   EXPECT_EQ("", err);
00062   EXPECT_EQ("/usr/include/stdio.h", path);
00063 }
